translations: 1. 使有义务，迫使：使某人有道义上或法律上的责任去做某事。
· The contract obliges you to complete the work on time.
合同要求你按时完成工作。
2. 施恩于，帮助：给予帮助或提供方便。

sentences.sentence: It only obliges the Eurocrats to respond.
sentences.translation: 它仅仅能责成欧盟官员作出回应。

sentences.sentence: LVMH was only pledging to do what the new French law already obliges it to.
sentences.translation: 路易·威登仅仅承诺它将按照法国新法案的规定来做。

sentences.sentence: These things affect the quality of the money that our system obliges the American public to accept.
sentences.translation: 这些事情影响了货币的质量，而我们的体系强迫着所有美国人接受这种货币。
